content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Would you like to start with a walkthrough of the property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Hello Mister Schmidt. Yes, I would be happy to get a walkthrough of the apartment. 

Now, as for the rental price, I would like to start with an offer of 900 euros per month. This is a fair price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your offer, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must say that for a brand-new apartment with such a prime location, 900 euros per month might be a bit on the low side. Let's continue our discussion while we take a look around, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. 

Now, considering that the apartment is unfurnished, I think a more appropriate price would be 850 euros per month. This is still a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Once again, Mr. Abbasi, while I appreciate your offer, I must maintain that for a property of this quality and location, 850 euros per month does not reflect its true value. I'm sure you understand that as a landlord, I am looking to secure a rental agreement that is fair to both parties. Let's continue our tour and perhaps we can find a price that meets your satisfaction while also reflecting the apartment's worth.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. 

Now, I have been considering your request, and I have decided to offer 880 euros per month as the rental price. This is a fair price for the apartment, and I believe it is a good compromise between our offers.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Abbasi. While 880 euros per month is closer to my expectations, I must still point out that for a brand-new, centrally located apartment, this price does not fully capture its value. Nevertheless, I am willing to continue our discussion, as you seem to be a serious tenant. Please, let's inspect the rest of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt.

Now, I have given your request further thought, and I have decided to offer 890 euros per month as the rental price. This is a fair price for the apartment, and I believe it is a good compromise between our offers.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your persistence is admirable, Mr. Abbasi. 890 euros per month is indeed closer to my expectations, but I still believe it could be slightly higher. Given the apartment's condition and location, I would be more inclined to accept an offer around 920 euros per month. Let's continue to look around the apartment, and perhaps you will see the value in my proposed price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt.

Now, I have considered your request, and I have decided to offer 900 euros per month as the rental price. This is a fair price for the apartment, and I believe it is a good compromise between our offers.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Mr. Abbasi, your patience and willingness to negotiate are commendable. Your offer of 900 euros per month is indeed closer to my expectations for this apartment. However, I would like to propose a small concession on my part: if you are willing to pay 910 euros per month, I will include all utilities in the price. This would save you the hassle of separate bills and provide you with a more straightforward monthly expense. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt.

Now, I have considered your proposal, and I have decided to accept your offer of 910 euros per month, including all utilities. This is a fair price for the apartment, and I believe it is a good compromise between our offers.

I agree to the price of 910 euros [your_name]!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mr. Abbasi. Your decision to accept 910 euros per month with all utilities included is a wise one. This apartment truly offers exceptional value, and I'm sure you'll be pleased with your choice. Let's continue with the paperwork to formalize our agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
